stages.name: The hero realizes their initial character motivation!
The hero sets out to fulfill their goals
Following a key turning point, the hero sets their sights on something new
The hero defeats all their enemies in hierarchical order

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: First impression of our hero.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Life-changing event or catalyst for change occurs!

moments.name: important meeting
moments.description: The hero meets someone important to their story.

moments.name: early tragedy
moments.description: Tragedy befalls a valued family member of the hero.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: The hero sets their sights on their objective!

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Midway turning point - hero is forced to pivot their goals.

moments.name: change in circumstances
moments.description: Point of no return! Onward to the finale!

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Every story needs a heart-wrenching scene before its final battle.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Our last glimpse of the hero!

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Marth, prince of Altea, escapes when his kingdom is invaded.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Two years later, Marth sets out to recruit allies and reclaim Altea.

moments.name: important meeting
moments.description: Marth arrives in Aurelis and forms an alliance with Hardin.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Princess Nyna gives Marth the Fire Emblem, a treasure for the champion who will save the world.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Marth storms Altea castle, but discovers that his mother is dead and his sister has been captured by Gharnef.

moments.name: change in circumstances
moments.description: Marth successfully assembles Starlight, the weapon needed to defeat Gharnef.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Marth defeats Gharnef and finally reunites with his sister, Elice.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Marth is advised by Nyna to seek out happiness and confesses his love to Caeda.

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Years after escaping Leonster, Leif has grown up in Fiana under the care of Finn.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Leif discovers that childhood friends Nanna and Mareeta have been captured. He sets out to rescue them from Munster prison.

moments.name: early tragedy
moments.description: Leif and company are forced to leave Eyvel behind as they escape Munster prison.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Leif and company escape Munster town and set out to raise a liberation army.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Leif is outmatched in a decisive battle with the empire, but is saved by Arion's arrival and flees Tarrah.

moments.name: change in circumstances
moments.description: Leif's close advisor is killed in battle, while is army is trapped in a siege in Leonster Castle. They hold out for six months until Seliph's army arrives.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Leif and his mentor August reflect on the tragedies of war, while enemy boss Reinhardt prepares to confront his own sister in battle.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Leif and Seliph swear a vow of friendship, determined to free Jugdral from the empire's tyrrany.

stages.name: Eliwood and Hector set out to save Elbert
Eliwood, Lyn, and Hector seek out the legendary weapons to defeat Nergal.

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Lyn finds an unconscious Mark on the plans of Sacae and takes him in.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Lyn discovers her true parentage: she is the lady of Caelin!

moments.name: important meeting
moments.description: Lyn meets the siblings Nils and Ninian, the latter of whom is rescued by Eliwood. Lyn and Eliwood encounter each other for the first time.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Lyn reunites with her grandmother and decides to stay in Caelin.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Eliwood and company find Elbert in Dragon's Gate but they are too late to save him. Nergal forces Ninian to open Dragon's Gate.

moments.name: change in circumstances
moments.description: Eliwood arrives at the Shrine of Seals and unlocks new powers; Ninian gives herself up to save her friends.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Nergal tricks Eliwood into killing Ninian.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Eliwood and Hector vow to protect those dear to them.

stages.name: Eirika journeys to reunite with her brother

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Princess Eirika escaped Renais following its invasion by Grado.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Eirika discovers that her brother Ephraim is fighting against Grado and decides to save him.

moments.name: important meeting
moments.description: Eirika and Ephraim reunite at Grado.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Eirika and Ephraim split up to amass allies from different nations.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Eirika and Ephraim reunite in the desert, having accomplished their individual goals.

moments.name: change in circumstances
moments.description: The twins confront childhood friend Lyon, who tricks them into giving him the sacred stones.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: After his defeat, Lyon bids each of the twins farewell and tells them he loves them.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: In a flashback, a young Lyon tells Eirika and Ephraim that he wishes to be their friend.

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Ike trains swordfighting with his father.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Soren reveals that Daein and Crimea have gone to war. Ike encounters the secret princess of Crimea in the woods.

moments.name: early tragedy
moments.description: Ike witnesses his father's death at the hand of the Black Knight.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Ike, Elincia, and the Greil Mercenaries escape Crimea.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Ike saves Reyson and reunites him with his sister. The herons restore Serenes Forest and Ike gains the trust of Sanaki.

moments.name: change in circumstances
moments.description: Upon reaching Daein's capital, Ike discovers that King Ashnard is no longer there. He is then betrayed by his ally Nasir.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Ike defeats the man who murdered his father and reconciles with Nasir.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Elincia thanks Ike for his help and they walk out together to greet the people of Crimea.

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: In a premonition, Corrin sees an impossible choice they have to make.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Corrin is kidnapped and taken to Hoshido, where they learn of their true parentage.

moments.name: early tragedy
moments.description: Corrin's birth mother is murdered at the hands of their adoptive father.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Corrin makes the decision to side with Hoshido.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Upon arriving in the Ice Tribe, Corrin is betrayed by their retainer, Flora, for fighting against Nohr.

moments.name: change in circumstances
moments.description: Corrin discovers a traitor within their midst. Leo arrives and saves Corrin, but refuses to formally join their cause.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Corrin's brother Xander accidentally kills their sister Elise before being defeated by Corrin. As his dying wish, Xander wishes Corrin to bring peace to the world.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Ryoma states that with the support of Corrin, they will continue bringing peace to the world.

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: In a premonition, Corrin sees an impossible choice they have to make.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Corrin is kidnapped and taken to Hoshido, where they learn of their true parentage.

moments.name: early tragedy
moments.description: Corrin's birth mother is murdered at the hands of their adoptive father.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Corrin makes the decision to side with Nohr.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Corrin rushes to Mokushu to aid their ally Kotaro, but is betrayed upon arrival.

moments.name: change in circumstances
moments.description: Corrin confronts Ryoma, their eldest sibling. Ryoma entrusts Corrin with ending the war before committing seppuku.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Corrin is visited by their brother Takumi's spirit, who begs them to let him rest in peace.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Xander states that with the support of Corrin, they will continue bringing peace to the world.
